title: Manulife — Attending Physician’s Statement (APS): Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis

fields.label: Patient/Insured Name
fields.summary: Write LAST, FIRST, MIDDLE exactly as shown on ID/policy.

fields.label: Attending Physician’s Name
fields.summary: Write full name with suffix if any.

fields.label: Physician’s Address
fields.summary: Write clinic/hospital address (building, street, city/province, ZIP).

fields.label: Reason for Consultation
fields.summary: Briefly state the reason this APS is being completed (e.g., ALS evaluation/claim).

fields.label: Date First Seen for This Condition
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Presenting Symptoms
fields.summary: List key symptoms at first consult (e.g., weakness, speech/swallow issues).

fields.label: Working/Final Diagnosis
fields.summary: Write diagnosis (ALS) and relevant qualifiers if indicated on the form.

fields.label: Date Symptoms First Noted
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Initial Site of Onset
fields.summary: Tick/indicate per form choices (e.g., bulbar, upper limb, lower limb, other).

fields.label: Date of Confirmed Diagnosis
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY when ALS was confirmed.

fields.label: Clinical Course/Progression
fields.summary: Summarize progression since onset (concise timeline).

fields.label: Upper Motor Neuron Signs
fields.summary: Tick/describe per form (e.g., spasticity, hyperreflexia, Babinski/Hoffmann).

fields.label: Lower Motor Neuron Signs
fields.summary: Tick/describe per form (e.g., atrophy, fasciculations, weakness).

fields.label: Bulbar/Cranial Nerve Findings
fields.summary: Tick/describe speech, swallow, tongue findings as applicable.

fields.label: EMG/NCS
fields.summary: Write date(s) and summary of findings as indicated on the form.

fields.label: Imaging
fields.summary: Write MRI/CT done (region, date, key findings) as the form requests.

fields.label: Other Tests
fields.summary: List only tests the form asks for (date + brief result).

fields.label: Mobility/Transfers
fields.summary: Tick per form checkboxes (independent / needs assistance / wheelchair / bedbound).

fields.label: Self-Care (ADLs)
fields.summary: Tick per form items (feed, bathe, dress, toilet). Note ‘since when’ if assistance needed.

fields.label: Communication/Nutrition/Respiration
fields.summary: Tick/describe per form (speech, swallowing/PEG, use of NIV/ventilation).

fields.label: Medications
fields.summary: List medicines as the form asks (name, dose, start date if required).

fields.label: Therapies/Procedures
fields.summary: Write therapies/interventions the form asks for (PT/OT/SLP, PEG/trach, etc.).

fields.label: Follow-up Plan
fields.summary: Write planned follow-ups/tests if a field for this is provided.

fields.label: Fitness for Work
fields.summary: Tick per form (fit / restricted / unfit) and specify limitations if prompted.

fields.label: Total & Permanent Disability (if the form asks)
fields.summary: Tick/confirm only if a TPD question is present; write date applicable if required.

fields.label: Comorbidities / Family History
fields.summary: List only if the form provides a field; keep concise.

fields.label: Previous Physicians/Hospitals
fields.summary: Write names/addresses and dates if requested by the form.

fields.label: Certification Statement
fields.summary: Read and certify accuracy as required by the form.

fields.label: Signature over Printed Name
fields.summary: Sign; print name.

fields.label: Date Signed
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: License/PTR/Stamp (if requested)
fields.summary: Write numbers and affix stamp/seal if the form has fields for these.
